thread.title: The Clean Cut: Dancing Stormtroopers, something viewers won't see in the new Star Wars trailer
thread.title_full: The Clean Cut: Dancing Stormtroopers, something viewers won't see in the new Star Wars trailer

title: The Clean Cut: Dancing Stormtroopers, something viewers won't see in the new Star Wars trailer
text:
Recommended by Alex Johnson , Deseret News Published: Tuesday, Oct. 20 2015 3:30 p.m. MDT Updated: 26 minutes ago Darth Vader and Stormtroopers dance to Michael Jackson Summary 
Star Wars fans rushed to purchase their tickets to "Star Wars: Episode VII — The Force Awakens" after the long-awaited world premiere of the trailer aired Monday. But what the trailer didn't feature was any footage of dancing Stormtroopers. 
Star Wars fans rushed to purchase tickets to "Star Wars: Episode VII — The Force Awakens" after the long-awaited world premiere of the trailer aired Monday on ESPN. Although the rush caused ticket sites to crash , fans still have almost two months until they can see the full film on Dec. 18. 
What the trailer didn't feature was any footage of dancing Stormtroopers. 
Dancers dressed as Stormtroopers have performed during several events, including the annual Star Wars Weekends at Disney's Hollywood Studios.
